description:
Contents:
 - Huashan-style Formal: Indigo "An outfit from a far-off land, popular in Gavamekia during the Imperial Era."
 - Huashan Kid's Formal: Indigo "An outfit for children from a far-off land, popular in Gavamekia during the Imperial Era."
 *You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Clothing Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
name: Indigo Huashan-style Formal Set
